title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 338.1 - Temporary appointments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 338.1 - Temporary appointments

State Regulations

The services of academic and professional employees
having temporary appointments may be terminated at will by the chief
administrative officer of the college concerned, notwithstanding any other
provision of this Part. There shall be no right of appeal from such a
termination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8

338.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
